resources.string: Select a music preset to play
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Can\'t start tutorial mode, loading preset

This is a Fun Loving girl who had a desire to make music. Alex enjoyed making dubstep to just share between friends and family. She soon talked her self into posting her creations online to see what kinda feedback she would get. getting an overly positive reveiws she continued to make music ever since with her latest track called OMFG - Jelly.

The Chainsmokers have become the hottest young American EDM DJ duo. Their signature sound has its foundations in Indie, Progressive and Pop Music. On the production front, their original tracks have all reached the Beatport top charts and their remixes always hit #1 on the HypeM charts. Their first major release, #SELFIE, and it\'s official music video swept the world so look out for much more to come!

Alan Walker (Alan Olav Walker) is a British-Norwegian record producer who was born in Northampton, England. He is best known for the electronic dance music single "Faded", which has reached number 1 in multiple countries, and on YouTube has over 650 million views and 4 million likes, placing it among the top 40 most liked YouTube videos.

Nathan is high school student in South Korea, who enjoys software and football. Currently attending Sunrin Internet High School in the 1st grade. Started developing about 5 years ago, started by HTML, now on Android. As you see, he has a big interest in Android\'s "Material Design". Also, known as a professional 9gagger.

Thanks! But this feature is not available yet ;)
Probably the best looking launchpad out there.

Tapad is a launchpad app for Android. It implemented the Material Design from the Google Design Guideline, and it looks beautiful. It mainly features song genres like EDM, Dubstep, Progressive House, Electronic.

Walk through how to use Tapad or tap \'Tips\' in Settings when you want this later.
This is an experimental feature. It may cause huge frame drops and glitches on low-ram devices. Use at your own risk.
This is an experimental feature. It seems your device has not enough ram, it will probably cause huge frame drops, glitches and even shutting down your device. Use at your own risk.
Tap the toggle button to load sounds to pads.
Press the pads in the right time to make the music!
Toggle the auto pattern to play more fabulously.
Tap the action button to get information, change settings & more.
Know about the artist, app itself & more.
Discover different presets and its artists.
Enable the tutorial mode to learn the preset.

You can view the changelog dialog again at any time from the about section.


Version 2.1


1. NEW: New preset (Alan Walker - Faded) 
 2. IMPROVEMENT: Removed feature (Tutorial mode, will be updated when it is stable / YouTube tutorial is coming soon) 
 3. FIX: Crashing when selecting decks 
 4. FIX: Wrong links on the artist page 


Version 2.0.1


1. NEW: Now showing changelog when app updates 
 2. NEW: Android Nougat support (Android 7.0) 
 3. IMPROVEMENT: Reduced lag on loading preset 
 4. FIX: Crashing at welcome screen on tablets 
 5. FIX: Sound not playing issue 
 6. FIX: Build date not matching 


Version 2.0


1. NEW: Completely renewed UI 
 2. NEW: Tutorial mode 
 3. NEW: Intro slide (first run tutorial) 
 4. NEW: Changelog added 
 5. NEW: Added Quickstart 
 6. NEW: Artist details updated 
 7. IMPROVEMENT: Sound volume increased 
 8. FIX: Sound not playing issue 
 9. FIX: Changed the app icon 


Version 1.1.2


1. FIX: UI Crashing (Still) 


Version 1.1.1


1. FIX: UI Crashing 


Version 1.1


1. NEW: New preset (The Chainsmokers - Roses) 
 2. FIX: Memory leak 


Version 1.0


1. NEW: New preset (OMFG - Hello) 
 2. NEW: Updated UI (4 X 4 layout) 
 3. IMPROVEMENT: Removed preset (Madeon Adventure) 
 4. FIX: Changed the app icon 
 5. FIX: Changed the app name 


Version 0.1

 1. NEW: New app 
 2. NEW: New preset (Madeon Adventure)
